name: brand-voice
description: Transforms scattered brand documents and conversation transcripts into enforceable AI guardrails. Searches across Confluence, Box, and conversation intelligence platforms like Gong to discover how your company actually communicates. Creates LLM-ready brand guidelines and continuously validates AI-generated content — from sales emails to marketing copy — ensuring every output matches your established voice, tone, and positioning. Surfaces open branding questions for team discussion when ambiguity is found.
